metadata.Title: CVE-2019-18346 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A CSRF issue was discovered in DAViCal through 1.1.8. If an authenticated user visits an attacker-controlled webpage, the attacker can send arbitrary requests in the name of the user to the application. If the attacked user is an administrator, the attacker could for example add a new admin user.

criterions.comment: davical package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.9.2-1').
